Description:
Preview a chart in xls, NPE throws out.

Build version:2.2.0.v20070709-0630

Steps to reproduce:
1. Get the attached report design, there is a chart in it.
2. Preview the report in xls, NPE throws out.

Expected Result:
The data in chart will be displayed in the xls output.
